tool_description: Filters files based on creation, modification, or access dates within specified time ranges.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to filter by date

date_type.description: Type of date to filter by: created, modified, or accessed

days_ago.description: Filter files from N days ago to present (1-3650)

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to filter.
Invalid date type: Use one of [created, modified, accessed].
Invalid date format: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date.
Invalid days_ago: Value must be between 1 and 3650.
Conflicting parameters: Use either date range (start_date/end_date) or days_ago, not both.
File timestamp error: Cannot retrieve date information for one or more files.
usage: Provide file_paths array and date_type. Specify either a date range with start_date/end_date or use days_ago for recent files. Returns files matching the date criteria.

filtered_files.description: Array of file paths that match the date criteria

files_removed.description: Number of files excluded by the date filter

date_range_used.description: Actual date range applied for filtering
